```{r warning = F}
library(dplyr)

# Function to update group assignment to weight matrix
updatemat <- function(file_path, rounds) {
  # Load required library
  library(dplyr)
  
  # Read the CSV file
  data <- read.csv(file_path, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
  
  # Extract student names
  students <- data[[1]]
  
  # Initialize the weight matrix
  n <- length(students)
  weight_matrix <- matrix(0, nrow = n, ncol = n, dimnames = list(students, students))
  
  # Set diagonal to -99
  diag(weight_matrix) <- -99
  
  # Update the weight matrix based on the group assignments in specified rounds
  for (round in rounds) {
    round_col <- data[[round + 1]] # Adjust for the correct column index
    
    for (group in unique(round_col)) {
      group_members <- which(round_col == group)
      for (i in 1:length(group_members)) {
        for (j in (i + 1):length(group_members)) {
          weight_matrix[group_members[i], group_members[j]] <- weight_matrix[group_members[i], group_members[j]] + 1
          weight_matrix[group_members[j], group_members[i]] <- weight_matrix[group_members[j], group_members[i]] + 1
        }
      }
    }
  }
  
  # Ensure the diagonal remains -99
  diag(weight_matrix) <- -99
  
  return(weight_matrix)
}
```

```{r}
# Function to calculate conflict scores
conflict <- function(weight_matrix) {
  n <- nrow(weight_matrix)
  conflict_score <- 0
  
  # Check for conflicts in the weight matrix
  for (i in 1:(n - 1)) {
    for (j in (i + 1):n) {
      if (weight_matrix[i, j] > 1) {
        conflict_score <- conflict_score + (weight_matrix[i, j] - 1)
      }
    }
  }
  
  return(conflict_score)
}

conflict_score <- conflict(weight_matrix)
print(conflict_score)
```

```{r}
# Final function: updatemat + conflict
conflict_per_round <- function(file_path, rounds) {
  # Initialize a vector to store conflict scores for each round
  conflict_scores <- numeric(length(rounds))
  
  # Calculate conflict score for each round
  for (i in seq_along(rounds)) {
    round <- rounds[i]
    weight_matrix <- updatemat(file_path, round)
    conflict_scores[i] <- conflict(weight_matrix)
  }
  
  return(conflict_scores)
}

scores <- conflict_per_round(file_path, rounds)
print(scores)
```
